column2: an A.M. Eatery////I have eaten at the Snooze in Denver and was thoroughly impressed.  When I saw one was opening in Houston I became excited.  The blueberry danish pancakes are my go to.  The flavor combination of the blueberries
column3: lemon and streusel is spot on.  Service is always great.  Everyone is super friendly and they check on you periodically.  The ONLY downfall to this location
column4: the parking.  The lot is small and parking on the side streets is a tasks since blocking driveways is not cool.
